title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 82-2.1 - Application of subpart
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8 §§ 82-2.1 - Application of subpart

State Regulations

This Subpart applies to hearings on charges against
tenured school employees pursuant to section
3020-a
of the

Education Law that were commenced by the filing of charges on or before August
24, 1994. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 8
§§
82-2.1

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
